sourcesContent:
Carrito de Compras

{{ item.title }}

{{ item.quantity }} ${{ item.price | number: '1.2-2' }}

Productos Guardados

{{ item.title }}

Cantidad: {{ item.quantity }} ${{ item.price | number: '1.2-2' }}

Resumen de compra

Productos: {{ cartItems.length }} - ${{ totalPrice | number: '1.2-2' }}

Envío: ${{ envio }}

Total: ${{ totalAmount | number: '1.2-2' }}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { CartService } from '../services/cart.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-carrito', templateUrl: './carrito.component.html', styleUrls: ['./carrito.component.css'] }) export class CarritoComponent implements OnInit { cartItems: any[] = []; savedItems: any[] = []; totalPrice: number = 0; envio: number = Math.floor(Math.random() * 3000) + 2000; // Random shipping cost totalAmount: number = 0; constructor(private cartService: CartService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.loadCart(); } loadCart(): void { this.cartItems = this.cartService.getCartItems(); this.calculateTotal(); } updateCart(item: any): void { this.cartService.updateCartItem(item); this.calculateTotal(); } removeFromCart(index: number): void { this.cartService.removeCartItem(index); this.loadCart(); } saveProduct(item: any): void { this.savedItems.push(item); this.removeFromCart(this.cartItems.indexOf(item)); } calculateTotal(): void { this.totalPrice = this.cartItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.price * item.quantity, 0); this.totalAmount = this.totalPrice + this.envio; } }
